common.h2h-tooltip: This is a head-to-head market. The winner will be the driver who finished on a better place in the main race.
common.mls-tooltip: MLS markets results are based on regulation results, should they go to overtime the regulation result is the one the market will resolve at.

common.top-bet-type-title: Will {{driver}} finish the {{race}} race in the {{betType}} drivers?

footer.disclaimer: This frontend is hosted decentrally on IPFS (InterPlanetary File System). It serves to visualise the blockchain data and help users interact with the Overtime contracts that belong to Thales DAO. By doing so it helps users understand the risks of using those smart contracts and what the specific interactions entail. The frontend does not facilitate anything else apart from interacting with those contracts in a visually comprehensive way. In doing so, it is no different than the functionality provided by Etherscan or RPCs (Remote Procedure Calls). The frontend itself does not belong to Thales DAO or any individual. It stores no user data and has no dedicated backend or database. All code is uploaded statically directly to the IPFS. Just as the blockchain does no geo-fencing and no KYC, neither can this frontend do so. However, by interacting with Thales DAO contracts, you commit to have read, understood and accepted <disclaimer>Thales DAO’s terms of use</disclaimer> and you take full liability in case you have not adhered to those terms. Thales DAO uses the decentralised sUSD token as collateral for all its transactions. In doing so it inherits all the usage rules from Synthetix DAO with regards to collateral and does not introduce its own.

market.skew-tooltip: Skew Impact is the amount of premium added to a position price based on current risk the AMM incurs from this specific market.

markets.zero-odds-tooltip: Sports AMM only offers liquidity in the price range of $0.05 to $0.95. Effectively this means that if the odds for a position are less than 5% or more than 95%, that position wont have liquidity.
markets.op-incentivized-tooltip: NFL markets are incentivized with 10,000 OP from Jan 14th games to Feb 12th games based on pro-rata volume. Check out the leaderboard <duneLink>here</ duneLink>.

rewards.description:
A total of 8,000 OP and 8,000 Thales will be distributed bi-weekly on a continuous basis as per TIP-96 to offset fees paid to the safebox contracts.
The leaderboard will calculate rewards as 90% rebate of the SafeBox fee, which is 3% of total amount paid in sUSD.
The $ value of OP and THALES will be calculated using a 7 days twap at the start of the period. If at the end of the two weeks period the total rebates end up being more than the initial twap value of OP and THALES tokens, the rebate will be reduced proportionally for every trader.
rewards.parlay-link: For the OP monthly parlay competition click here.
rewards.op-rewards-banner-message: OP rewards have started, check how you can earn those on <bold>the OP rewards page</bold>

quiz.title: Sports Trivia competition
quiz.start-quiz-description:
Hey sports fans! Ready to test your knowledge and beat the field?

Overtime has launched a sports trivia competition. The trivia is available to everyone to test their knowledge and compete.

Connect your wallet and enter your Twitter handle to start the trivia! For any questions please join our Discord.

leaderboard.title: Trivia Leaderboard
leaderboard.description:
This is the trivia leaderboard where you can see how are you faring against the competition.

You can take the trivia as many times as you like here.

quiz.help-us-improve-tooltip: Help us improve sports trivia by adding new questions to the questions database.

finish-messages.rank-info: With {{points}} {{pointsLabel}} you are ranked {{rank}} out of {{totalParticipants}} participants.

landing-page.best-odds: Join the Web3 sports markets revolution
landing-page.info-text-1: You don’t need to create an user. We don't gather any kind of personal information either.
landing-page.info-text-2: When centralized entities are falling, transparency is key. All our code is public and the smart contracts can be reviewed by anyone
landing-page.info-text-3: There’s no one holding your collateral. Your keys, your tokens.
landing-page.info-text-4: Industry-leader provides tamper-proof odds and sport matches result in a decentralized way.
landing-page.info-text-5: Every interaction with Overtime sports AMM is done on Optimism network, leader in scalability.
landing-page.join-discord: Need any help? Join our discord

mint-world-cup-nft.not-eligible-text: Your wallet is not eligible to mint a Zebro NFT yet!
mint-world-cup-nft.eligible-text: Your wallet is eligible to mint a Zebro NFT!
mint-world-cup-nft.stake-10-thales: To be able to mint a Zebro NFT, you need to have at least 10 THALES staked.
mint-world-cup-nft.second-option: The second option to get you on allowlist, is to complete following steps:
mint-world-cup-nft.tag-3-friends: On the same tweet, comment your ETH address & tag 3 friends
mint-world-cup-nft.minting-is-free: Minting is free, you can mint only one NFT per wallet. This NFT is non-transferable.
mint-world-cup-nft.eligible-text-1: Zebro NFT collection is used as an entry for the Overtime FIFA World Cup campaign.
mint-world-cup-nft.eligible-text-2: Mint a Zebro of your favourite national team and be eligible for 50,000 OP & 30,000 THALES bonus rewards!
mint-world-cup-nft.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to mint this NFT? You can mint ONLY ONE NFT per wallet.
mint-world-cup-nft.already-minted: You have already minted your NFT
mint-world-cup-nft.zebro-wct-collection-text: is part of an incentivized campaign to represent your favorite country during the World Cup and be eligible for a share of 50,000 OP tokens and 30,000 THALES tokens, along with exclusive multipliers for parlays and individual matches.
mint-world-cup-nft.congrats: Congrats! You have successfully minted the Zebro NFT!

leaderboard.reward-calculations: Reward calculations will be pro-rata Volume Based with max additional 40% volume boost if the following conditions are met:
leaderboard.home-country-multiplier-text: If your World Cup match involves the same National team as your Zebro, you will receive +10% rewards boost
leaderboard.wash-trading: *Overtime team holds the right to disqualify wash traders from the campaign
leaderboard.parlay-boost-text: If your World Cup match is in a Parlay ticket, you will get a boost of:
leaderboard.underdog-multiplier-text: If your World Cup match position is priced under 0.3 (odds are above 1:3.33), you will get a 10% rewards boost.

referral.no-result: There are no results for this table
referral.paragraph:
Overtime Referrals Program is an on-chain incentivized user acquisition and onboarding tool.The program allows anyone to generate a Referral Link and share it with users they are trying to onboard.

When sharing your personal Referral Link, you earn 0.5% of all sUSD volume your referred users produce! There are no manual claims needed, the sUSD is auto-accruing in your wallet in form of simple sUSD transfers.

description.connect-wallet: If you don't have Optimism connected Wallet installed, you will be routed to install a wallet of choice before being able to connect it.
description.fund: Before you can use Overtime, first you need to get ETH on your Optimism connected wallet. After clicking on the Fund button, choose one of the available options to continue.
description.exchange: Overtime uses popular stablecoins (Crypto USD) to execute trades. By clicking on Exchange to sUSD button, seamlessly swap ETH to a desired amount of stablecoins.
description.trade: Now you are funded and ready to use Overtime Markets. Good luck!

discount-vault.title: Discount Vault
discount-vault.description:
Buys positions that have more than {{odds}} odds and are available at a discount larger than {{discount}}.

All deposits that enter a round count towards gamified staking volume.
discount-vault.risks: The vault has an utilization rate of {{utilizationRate}} which ensures no more than {{utilizationRate}} of deposited to a round is put to risk. Furthermore, out of those {{utilizationRate}} a maximum of {{allocationLimitsPerMarketPerRound}} can be spent on a single market, thus diversifying the risk into multiple markets that have odds more than {{odds}}.

degen-discount-vault.title: Degen Discount Vault
degen-discount-vault.description:
Buys positions at any odds that are available for more than {{discount}} discount.

All deposits that enter a round count towards gamified staking volume.
degen-discount-vault.risks: The vault has an utilization rate of {{utilizationRate}} which ensures no more than {{utilizationRate}} of deposited to a round is put to risk. Furthermore, out of those {{utilizationRate}} a maximum of {{allocationLimitsPerMarketPerRound}} can be spent on a single market.

safu-discount-vault.title: Safu Discount Vault
safu-discount-vault.description:
Buys positions that have more than {{odds}} odds and are available at any discount.

All deposits that enter a round count towards gamified staking volume.
safu-discount-vault.risks: The vault has an utilization rate of {{utilizationRate}} which ensures no more than {{utilizationRate}} of deposited to a round is put to risk. Furthermore, out of those {{utilizationRate}} a maximum of {{allocationLimitsPerMarketPerRound}} can be spent on a single market, thus diversifying the risk into multiple markets that have odds more than {{odds}}.

vault.variables:
Variables:

  • Utilization rate: {{utilizationRate}}
  • Price lower limit: {{priceLowerLimit}}
  • Price upper limit: {{priceUpperLimit}}
  • Max Skew impact: {{skewImpactLimit}}
  • Max allocation on a single market: {{allocationLimitsPerMarketPerRound}}
  • Max total deposit: {{maxAllowedDeposit}}
  • Max users in the vault: {{maxAllowedUsers}}
  • Minimum amount on a single trade: {{minTradeAmount}}
  • Minimum deposit: {{minDepositAmount}}
  • Round duration: {{roundLength}} days
vault.your-next-round-allocation-label: Your allocation for the next round: <bold>{{amount}}</bold>
vault.estimated-amount-tooltip: This is an estimated amount. The actual amount will be calculated upon closing the current round based on the round PnL.
vault.deposit-message: Deposit funds into the vault for the next round.
vault.withdrawal-message: You can request a withdrawal and your funds will be sent to you automatically at the end of the round when the round closes.
vault.withdrawal-requested-message: You requested to withdraw <bold>{{amount}}</bold><tooltip />. Your funds will be sent to you automatically at the end of the round when the round closes.
vault.first-deposit-withdrawal-message: You deposited for the next round and you can withdraw these funds at the end of the next round.
vault.deposit-withdrawal-warning: Withdrawal is requested, you cannot deposit.
vault.deposit-max-amount-of-users-warning: Maximum number of users in the vault is reached, you cannot deposit.
vault.deposit-vault-cap-reached-warning: The vault cap is reached, you cannot deposit.
vault.deposit-min-amount-error: The minimum amount for the deposit is {{amount}}
vault.withdrawal-deposit-warning: You cannot withdraw as you already deposited for the next round.

parlay-leaderboard.title: Parlay Incentives Leaderboard
parlay-leaderboard.description: A total of 10,000 OP will be distributed to the best parlays of the month. The tickets will be ranked based on the number of positions on the parlays, followed by total quote.
parlay-leaderboard.distribution-note: Rewards will be distributed to the top 20 parlays for the month!
parlay-leaderboard.no-parlays: No winning parlays registered in the period yet.
parlay-leaderboard.warning: *Overtime team holds the right to disqualify wallets we suspect of gaming the system.
parlay-leaderboard.info: If multiple parlays have the same number of positions and total quote the following will be used as tie-breakers in respective order:
parlay-leaderboard.info2: - Actual total quote (gotten by multiplying positions individually)
